extendedInfo.description: Want to catch more fish? And have more fun doing it? Fishing My-CastÂ® by Garmin is the Android app that can turn your smartphone or mobile device into a real âfishermanâs friend.â Use it to plan your trips, keep an eye on the weather, and record where the big ones are biting â with a detailed log of your catches keyed to photos that you can share. Fishing My-CastÂ® gives you the tools and information you need for more successful fishing.The proof is in the pictures.Not only does Fishing My-CastÂ® help you locate and mark the best fishing hot spots, but it also provides all the visual proof you need to verify your âbragging rightsâ. You can maintain a photo catch log to record as much, or as little, information as you want â including the size of your catch, what lure you were using, what kind of structure or weather conditions were present, and what techniques you used to land that trophy fish. Weather and water conditions are also recorded automatically. And catch icons can be logged as waypoints on your map, so youâll know how to return to those spots where you did some of your best fishing. The fish log is a great way to track your successes throughout the season and note patterns in fish activity that you can use for the future. Better choices make for better fishing.Fishing My-CastÂ® also includes a complete package of weather reports, forecasts and radar imagery, plus fish activity, navigation and planning tools to help you target the best times and places to go fishing. The fish activity forecast goes out 30 days and is based on sun and moon positions. Once youâve picked a day that looks promising, itâs easy to zero in with hour-by-hour information to see if itâs worth getting up early or staying out late. Then, before you launch, you can use the high-resolution Doppler radar images to keep an eye on any changing weather patterns or approaching storm activity. You can also add optional lightning and severe weather alerts â so youâre not surprised by any sudden squalls or frontal activity that might blow up while youâre out on the water.With Fishing My-CastÂ® by Garmin, you hold the key to a great fishing future â right in the palm of your hand.

reviews.title: Also a great fishing app!
reviews.comment: Not just the best weather app but also the best fishing companion app I\'ve used! Only regret is having paid for the normal My-Cast already but still worth the cost any way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not to bad
reviews.comment: Nice interface and charts. 5 stars no problem if app incorporated tides for us coastal anglers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tltcyber
reviews.comment: Love weather and fishing chart that predicts best fishing days
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes all the time.
reviews.comment: I had this app for two days and it crashed on me three times. Do not waste $6 on this app. Seem to happen when I would try to resume a fishing trip.
reviews.author: Rick Hale II

reviews.title: Good but lacking post trip details
reviews.comment: I really wish I could analyze my fishing trips once completed. Ideally there would be a web interface I could look through past trips and see the times and types and fish totals, and even share with my friends. Please add this.
reviews.author: Taylor Zoppi

reviews.title: Absolutely top notch.....but
reviews.comment: To be the perfect fishing companion, it needs coastal tidal information. If we could get that in a later release that would make this PERFECT. Thanks for a smooth running and useful app. Don\'t waste your time or money on anything else. I have replaced several free apps that I just did not care for but provided information that I like to have on hand. Buy it. Its worth it and you will not be disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: p
reviews.comment: Very inconsistent readings, radar is great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Installed on my Verizon Samsung Galaxy S4 and it will not load complete forecast data. One star until fixed.
reviews.author: Michael Levite

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Great app for fishing and for weather.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for tracking fishing trips
reviews.comment: With this app, I can track exactly where I caught my fish, along with details like what equipment I was using.  I can then view my catches on a map. It also let\'s you drop waypoints. Very cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a big supporter mycast, but this is bad, not recommended.
reviews.author: Matthew DiMatteo

reviews.title: This is great!
reviews.comment: Great job keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User
